name: Aliens don`t touch my cows!
description:
Kill the Aliens and Save the cows!

The red Alien drop an Item, with which you can use the Flamethrower

Controls: W,A,S,D            Shoot: Q        FlameThrower:  E       Menu: Q/E

Game Designed by first year Usek University Students, made in the second semester

Thanks to : https://itch.io/profile/gorigoitia

                       https://itch.io/profile/leafxel
